reviews.text: First time ordering from here.  I ordered a medium pizza with Xtra cheese, pepperoni, and mushrooms.  I did feel like it didn't have extra cheese, but I liked everything else. I also didn't realize how big their pizzas were. My medium was huge. I will be trying their Sicilian style next time, which states more cheese, more sauce, and thicker crust. The staff were super nice, and they have a rewards program for free food.
My favorite pizza. The sauce is unbeatable. I use the coupon they have posted on their website and order the "Largest Large in Town" an 18" 2 items pizza. It's usually  ready in 15-20 minutes.

1st time here and just found probably the best pizza now in Charleston area. We got the plain cheese with extra cheese on top and it was most delicious and fresh made. The crust has a wonderful flavor as does the sauce and cheese also. I think this will be our go-to place for pizza from now on. BTW: the crust was so moist and delicious that we ate the entire slice. Resturant was super clean and has plenty of tables to relax and enjoy your pie. Very friendly staff and service!! Folks, you've got to try this resturant.

7/9/22. Went here again and had a large pizza with half extra cheese and sausage. Most delicious dinner.
BTW: if your traveling on I-64 or I-77 and want an EZ off EZ on, this is not far off the highway.

I placed an order for over $100 and one pizza was supposed to be a bbq chicken pizza with extra onions, they put so much cheese on it you couldn‚Äôt eat it, they forgot my pizza bread and when I called they didn‚Äôt believe that I didn‚Äôt get it. I informed the lady that we ordered there quite often but no more, she just said whatever. My wife called and ask for the manager and he hung up on her when she complained about her pizza. Apparently this establishment is going downhill.

Ordered a pizza 718 got it at 835 after it said it would be here at 738. Called and spoke to manager or at least he said he was but sure didn‚Äôt sound like he was with his professionalism. Pizza left store 36 mins ago he said it was at barely warm at best for 43$

editorial_summary.overview: Low-key, family-run pizzeria chain serving classic & Sicilian-style pies, plus subs & sides.

recentReviews.author: Nicole Summers
recentReviews.text: First time ordering from here.  I ordered a medium pizza with Xtra cheese, pepperoni, and mushrooms.  I did feel like it didn't have extra cheese, but I liked everything else. I also didn't realize how big their pizzas were. My medium was huge. I will be trying their Sicilian style next time, which states more cheese, more sauce, and thicker crust. The staff were super nice, and they have a rewards program for free food.

recentReviews.author: Peteria Cochran
recentReviews.text: My favorite pizza. The sauce is unbeatable. I use the coupon they have posted on their website and order the "Largest Large in Town" an 18" 2 items pizza. It's usually  ready in 15-20 minutes.

recentReviews.author: Steve Bee
recentReviews.text:
1st time here and just found probably the best pizza now in Charleston area. We got the plain cheese with extra cheese on top and it was most delicious and fresh made. The crust has a wonderful flavor as does the sauce and cheese also. I think this will be our go-to place for pizza from now on. BTW: the crust was so moist and delicious that we ate the entire slice. Resturant was super clean and has plenty of tables to relax and enjoy your pie. Very friendly staff and service!! Folks, you've got to try this resturant.

7/9/22. Went here again and had a large pizza with half extra cheese and sausage. Most delicious dinner.
BTW: if your traveling on I-64 or I-77 and want an EZ off EZ on, this is not far off the highway.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.2/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the unbeatable sauce and flavorful crust, making it a go-to pizza place in the Charleston area. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant offers a convenient rewards program for free food, encouraging repeat visits. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The pizza sizes are notably large, providing great value for the price. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative customer service experiences and unresolved complaints - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and delivery issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor online visibility and potential decline in reputation - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
